page.title: 10Local Leisure Survey
page.content:
Over 75% of those questioned watched{ {television}, did{gardening},{swimming} or cycling in their{leisure}time. It was noticeable that no-one interviewed played golf, even though there is an international golf course at nearby St.Mellion. The results of the survey are:
76%-100% 61%-75% Television Walking Gardening Cooking Swimming Reading Cycling Radio Scouts & Guides
31%-60% 0%-30% Outdoor ball games Indoor Sports Computers Horse Riding Dancing Toy Models Farming Physical Fitness Collecting Veteran Cars
